(VehicleType != null ) || (SibMeasure != null) || (Power != null && Power != 0) || (SerialNumber != null && SerialNumber != "") || (EngineSize != null && EngineSize != 0) || (Model != null ) || (YearOfIssue != null && YearOfIssue != 0) || (VehicleRegNumber != null && VehicleRegNumber != "") || (VehicleRegDate != null) ||(VehicleDeRegDate != null) ||(InOtherSystem == True)

(ShipName != null && ShipName != "") || (ShipRegNumber != null && ShipRegNumber != "") || (OldName != null && OldName != "") || (ShipType != null) || (ShipAppointment != null && ShipAppointment != "") || (ShipClass != null) || (BuildYear != null && BuildYear != 0) || (BuildPlace != null && BuildPlace != "") || (ShellMaterial != null && ShellMaterial != "") || (MainEngineType != null && MainEngineType != "") || (MainEngineCount != null && MainEngineCount != 0) || (MainEnginePower != null && MainEnginePower != 0) || (PowerUnit != null) || (Length != null && Length != 0) || (LengthUnit != null) || (Width != null && Width != 0) || (WidthUnit != null) || (DraughtHard != null && DraughtHard != 0) || (DraughtHardUnit != null) || (DraughtLight != null && DraughtLight != 0) || (DraughtLightUnit != null) || (MostHeight != null && MostHeight != 0) || (MostHeightUnit != null) || (DeadWeight != null && DeadWeight != 0) || (DeadWeightUnit != null) || (SeatingCapacity != null && SeatingCapacity != 0) || (Harbor != null && Harbor != "") || (OldHarbor != null && OldHarbor != "")

(AircraftKind != null) || (AircraftType != null) || (SerialName != null && SerialName != "") || (AircraftAppointment != null && AircraftAppointment != "") || (GliderNumber != null && GliderNumber != "") || (EngineNumber != null && EngineNumber != "") || (PropulsionNumber != null && PropulsionNumber != "") || (ProductionDate != null) || (MakerName != null && MakerName != "") || (AirtcraftLocation != null && AirtcraftLocation != "")
